title: 🎓 Education & 🛠️ Experience
description: Drawing from a diverse educational background and hands-on experience in Software Engineering field, I bring a dynamic perspective to every project.

data.description: As a Java Developer at Grid Dynamics, I optimized WiFi server settings to automate processes, facilitated smooth releases by monitoring CPU usage and automating workflows, and improved software reliability by creating tests with 90% code coverage.

As a Research and Development Specialist at Dassault Systèmes, I developed 16+ project management software APIs with 90% code coverage, published event messages for system communication, integrated third-party services, and implemented Test-Driven Development, increasing productivity by 20%. I also gained extensive experience in agile and scrum methodologies.

As a Senior Software Developer at Wipro Ltd, I engineered Levi’s revenue forecasting dashboard, integrating a frontend with an ML backend, and managing significant traffic. I led UI development for multiple AI-driven apps, boosting productivity by 40%, and implemented role-based access control, doubling visitor engagement.
The Academy of Technology or AOT is a self-financed undergraduate engineering college.
Pursued my higher secondary education at Bankura Zilla School, focusing on mathematics and science subjects
